column2: UPDATE 4-Onyx explores possible sale after rejecting Amgen offerOnyx explores possible sale after rejecting Amgen offer NEW YORK Cancer drugmaker Onyx Pharmaceuticals Inc  said on Sunday it rejected a roughly $10 billion takeover offer from larger biotechnology company Amgen Inc  as too low but still is considering selling itself.
